pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Above
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.Ghz or above
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
